item.title: You Can Own Elon Musk's SpaceX. But at What Price?
item.description: An ETF that can trade all day is investing in an asset that rarely changes hands. Figuring out what it’s worth is a guessing game.

item.title: Gold Futures Near All-Time High on Softer U.S. Dollar
item.description: Gold futures rose to near-record highs as the U.S. dollar rally faded.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Down on Warmer Forecasts
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures were lower as weather forecasts warmed up after this week’s Arctic blast and production started to pick up.

item.title: Even Trump Couldn't Save This Energy IPO
item.description: Venture Global’s timing is almost perfect, but investors might have concerns about the LNG exporter.

item.title: Oil Prices Rise But on Track to End Week Lower on Trump Decisions
item.description: Oil rose though gains likely reflected a technical correction, while Trump’s tariff threats could disrupt energy flows, raise consumer prices and ulti...
